DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study gather systematic clinical data whether aripiprazole , partial dopamine agonist , beneficially affect schizophrenia plus cocaine dependence subject . Since aripiprazole establish effect schizophrenia , study focus whether aripiprazole concurrently reduce co-morbid cocaine dependence schizophrenia plus cocaine dependence sufferer compare standard typical antipsychotic treatment ( perphenazine ) . The work hypothesis state subject aripiprazole treatment arm study give few cocaine positive urine specimen compare perphenazine control arm .
